critique: This document is an executive order that exempts a specific individual, August Thomas, from mandatory retirement for one year. It cites the authority vested in the president by a specific act of Congress. Given the limited scope and specific nature of the order, it doesn't seem to have strong implications for any of the axes. It is hard to make a determination based on the limited information, so I will default to zero for most axes. The only exception is executive power, which is slightly expanded.
